name: FBLA Trivia Trek
description:
Play as Alex, an FBLA student trivia-battling your way to the top of each level of FBLA competition: districts, states, and nationals! Brush up on your FBLA knowledge, and prove yourself amongst your peers!

I made this project for the FBLA 2018–2019 competitive event: Computer Game and Simulation Programming., but just got around to posting it a year later. We placed 4th at the state level of competition!

I worked with two peers, one of whom created all of the art for the game and the other whom I collaborated with to write half of the code each.
